subject: resource/Hidayat_Orujov
object: Hidayat Khudush oglu Orujov (Azerbaijani: Hidayət Orucov Xuduş oğlu; born September 5, 1944) is a notable writer and an Azerbaijani politician serving as the Chairman of State Committee for Work with Religious Organizations of Azerbaijan Republic.During the Karabakh movement and days leading up to the Sumgait pogrom of Armenians, Orujov threatened the Armenian population of Sumgait to "break into your houses, torch your apartments, rape your women, and kill your children".
human_readable: Hidayat Orujov's abstract is a notable writer and an Azerbaijani politician serving as the Chairman of State Committee for Work with Religious Organizations of Azerbaijan Republic.
